metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0047 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: none. Reason: This candidate was in a CNA pool that was not assigned to any issues during 2023. Notes: none.

notes.Note: sbeattie> see SUSE bug for reason for rejection.
